text: Anusha Samaranayake (born 25 February 1962) is a Sri Lankan former first-class cricketer. He is now a bowling coach with the National Coaching Department. In January 2016 he was initially suspended by Sri Lanka Cricket for two months because of match-fixing allegations. However, in August 2016 he was cleared. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of St. John's College, Nugegoda Category:Sri Lankan cricketers Category:Cricketers from Colombo Category:Burgher Recreation Club cricketers
title: Anusha Samaranayake
